sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that increases your haste by 12% for 12 sec. Casting Summon Darkglare always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! also increases the damage of Unstable Affliction by 50% and causes Unstable Affliction to spread to up to 3 targets within 40 yds for 17 sec.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 373 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,927 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3 million Fire damage to your primary target and 244,454 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Zap yourself for 315,669 Nature damage, gaining 19,664 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)

name: Tabard of the Guardians of Hyjal

spell.name: Champion of the Guardians of Hyjal

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of the Guardians of Hyjal.  All reputation gains while in Cataclysm dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
